subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The gulf between the East and West conferences persists, but, as Rod Thorn observes, the league should continue trending toward the current successful style, which means a fast tempo and more 3-point shots.
snippet: The gulf between the East and West conferences persists, but, as Rod Thorn observes, the league should continue trending toward the current successful style, which means a fast tempo and more 3-point shots.
